prompt: Smoke-hazed resurrection party, dim golden light. Mirrors veiled in clattering beads reflect splintered selves—Harry’s face with your eyes. Creative director with dissolving clipboard counts heartbeats. You clutch wrist, pulse ticking borrowed time. Cinematic, eerie, intimate.

Overlay the guests with faint looping ghost-images—torn dresses flicker between 2/3/4 fingers, phone screens flash 11:11→3:33→future years, conversation mouths stutter rewind—while Harry/you at the wall lifts a glass that reflects the viewer instead of the room.
Split the figure into two overlapping silhouettes, sharing one flickering heartbeat in amber chests while translucent beads freeze their mirrored reflections mid-shatter.
